case.state: Hello, ~human~! Did you know it's my birthday today? I'm here to celebrate~ I'm sure it'll be so much fun!
Oh wait, Anzu-chan? I can't believe you'd come to a place like this. Fufu... will keep it a secret from everyone that I'm here? Good, good, I'll keep your secret too~
Anzu-chan! Hello again, I wouldn't have imagined you'd become a regular here-- Oh? You're wearing your uniform's tie...? Fufu, are you so proud to be a Yumenosaki student?
Anzu-chan, you're here again! My, I would have never expected for you to become a regular in a place like this~ Fufu, don't worry, I'll keep your secret if you keep mine.
Fufu, hello once again, ~human~! It's alright to join this table, yes? I'm sure it is, since you're going around wearing my tie like that.

state.text: Oh? So we meet again, ~human~. Now... care to say what you're doing wearing this tie, not too late after I realized I had lost it at the Inventory?
Hello once again, ~human~! How are you-- Oh? What is that you're wearing on your neck? I didn't know you were a third year Yumenosaki student, hmmm~

case.state: Hello once again, ~human~! Aw, did you decide to not wear my tie this time? What a shame, it really did look like a cute collar on you...
Oh, it's ~human~ again! You won't mind if I join your table, right? I really had fun at our last game~
Oh, do you happen to have room for one more at your table? You can call me Eichi. It's a pleasure to meet you.
Ah, would it be okay if I joined your game? Fufu, thank you. Call me Eichi, I hope we have fun together~
Fufu, an all-female table? Would it be okay for me to join? I'll look for another if you'd prefer I don't...
Fufu, seems like people are starting to join this one, huh~ if you don't mind, may I play with you as well?
Ah, if Keito finds out I'm here, I'll definitely get an earful, but... how can one resist such an interesting experience? Anyway, I'm Eichi, nice to meet you all~
Oh, hello, ~human~, I feel like I've seen you around before? My name is Eichi, it's nice to meet you.
Oh my, am I the last one to arrive here? I'm glad I wasn't too late to join! You all may call me Eichi, it's nice to meet everyone.
(Eh, seeing someone wearing a lab coat is a little... well, it'll fade into the background eventually, I'm sure.)
Oh, are you Dr. Ziegler? ...huh, I'm not sure why I recognized you so quickly. Perhaps I've seen you before? I go to a lot of doctors, it's hard to keep track of it.
(Eh, seeing someone wearing a lab coat is a little... well, it'll fade into the background eventually, I'm sure.)
(Ah, is that a cigarette? I don't want to upset her, but... hm, maybe I should leave the game...)
Oh, a nurse, huh... makes me wonder if Keito found out and sent you there...
Oh, a nurse, huh... well, I suppose I have coverage if this awful body decides to be cruel to me...
Oh, you... I've seen you around before, but we haven't played together, have we? Fufu, you're as eager as you look from afar, aren't you...
(Oh, working at Eagle Jump...? I wonder how hold she is, then. You have to be 18 to enter this place, and she does look very young, so maybe she's a prodigy...)
Eh--? Did that girl just... well, it's just another ~background.time~ at the Inventory, I suppose...
Hmm...? Forgive the question, but, ~target~, are you sure you're in the right place? You don't seem like a strip poker type.
~target~? Hm, somehow I have the feeling I've seen you before.
Eh~? This should be an interesting game, I see.
Excuse me, do you happen to be-? Ah, sorry, I should speak more quietly! I'd hate to put an esteemed colleague in trouble.
Ah, wait, is that a camera? (Um, I might have not thought this through, after all...)

(Oh, a student? Hmm, I suppose ~target.ifMale(he|she)~ probably isn't someone wearing ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ old uniform, like me... I should try to be a somewhat reliable senior, then, but this might be hard...)
Ah, it's a pleasure to meet you, ~target~! My name is Eichi, I hope we can get along.
It’s wonderful to meet you, ~target~. I am T… actually, you may just refer to me as Eichi! Don't worry about it.
Oh, Nagisa-chan, you said it was your birthday, right? Happy birthday! I hope you have fun with the game~ Ah, I wish I had known beforehand so I could get you a gift.
Ah, a bar, and in my 20th birthday too! I'm so excited~ I hope me wearing my uniform for fun doesn't make the servers think my ID is fake, though.
It's almost Christmas, ~human~.
Let's get it started, everyone~! Fufu, but you have to go easy on me, because it's my birthday~
Um... We're going to play... here? This doesn't seem like a very safe place to hold a game, as well as being quite public...
Oh, thank you for warning everybody, Fina, that's good practice. We should have all party members fully consenting to the situation, right?
Eh, we have two people with Sakura as their last name, huh? Well, since Nanoko-chan doesn't mind being called referred to this way, I'll call her that. (Interdimensional...?)
Ah, I'm honored to be asked this, Miku-san! I'd absolutely love to, of course~
Aw, Suzukaze-san, there's no need to feel about that. If anything it makes you the cutest person here, you know~
(That Nanoko-chan girl is really cute, but, interdimensional...? Ah, you know what, I'll just play my game and not think too hard about it.)
...eh? Is that voice coming from... a butterfly?
(Eh, well, I won't say anything, I'm sure it'll be fine.)
Oh, Nagatoro, do you and ~player~ know each other? I wonder from where...
Eh, you want to stop the game? Why would you choose to do that by taking part in it, though? Seems counterproductive to me~
(Suzukaze-san? Aoba-san? How should I refer to her, if I'm not sure of her age? She seems friendly, I'm leaning towards the former, but I guess I'll err on the side of caution...)

Oh, my, I hope you don't mind the comment, but your accent is actually quite cute, Gloria! My english isn't perfect so I might be a bit slow to understand, but you sound so full of energy, I'm determined to have a good game now~
Eh, so ~human~ has decided to spend ~human.ifMale(his|her)~ friday night with me? My, I'm honored.
Oh, it seems that more than one person came here dressed in "proper attire", hm? We blend in quite well in this background, don't you think~?
Ah, did I walk into the wrong room, perhaps? Ufufu...
Ah, did I walk into the wrong room, perhaps? Ufufu...
Eh, at a bar? That almost feels mean to me, I still have a few months before I turn 20...
Oh, hm, I suppose I accidentally came here in proper attire?
Oh, we're doing this at a public place? Who chose that? It might be dangerous, you know, people might... see us...
...isn't anyone else shivering a bit...? Ah, well, if anything, this gives me extra motivation to win...
Ah, the heat here is quite... {small}well, I just hope it doesn't make me pass out.
Oh, whose bedroom's is this? I hope you don't mind if I sit on the bed for a second or two, my legs get tired easily...
Is this your bedroom, ~human~? It looks quite comfortable.
Ah, are we having a sleepover after the game? I'd love it, I've never had a sleepover with anyone but my childhood friend!
Fufu, aren't we all glad today is a friday? Let's enjoy ourselves and celebrate this week's hard work, everyone~!
So, well... perhaps blondes do have more fun?
Oh, by the way, ~idol~, if you're concerned about anyone spreading rumors about you being here, you can come talk to me after the game, yes? I'll have you covered!
Fufu, now doesn't that look a bit like one of these... otome games, I think is the name? Did you plan this out specifically, ~girl~?
Well, I'm excited for the game, but, first, I would like to request that no pictures of me are shared. I would hate to give anyone legal trouble, so...
Ah, am I the only guy in a group filled with women? Ufufu, I almost feel like I'm being bullied... go easy on me, will you?
Hmm, is this a male-only event, or just a coincidence? Not that I'm bothered by it, of course...
(It's not the best idea for someone in my career to come to a place like this, but, I've done my best to prepare for possible undesirable outcomes, so...)
Let's get rid of ~cards.ifPlural(these|this)~ ~cards.text~ good ~cards.ifPlural(card|cards)~, please~?
I'm impatient, dealer... take ~cards.ifPlural(these|this)~ ~cards.text~ away from me.
Swap ~cards.ifPlural(these|this)~ ~cards.text~ for awful ones and I'll reward you~
Oh, no, this hand is just perfect.
Dealer, don't you wanna see me like that? Give me a new, bad hand. Please.
Whole new hand, please. Fufu, do you want to see me strip, dealer? Are you looking forward to it?
Mm... I'll need to trade all. If dealer wants to see me strip, I shouldn't try to... go down without a fight.
I think I'm fine as I am...? No need for anything new.
Mm... no, this hand is fine, I think...
Um... perhaps ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
Give me...~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~... please?
If you'd be so kind...~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ for me?
Um... now what do I... oh, yes, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please.
I think... ~cards.text~... yes.
~Cards.text~? Wait no, maybe... Ah, nevermind.
I'll swap... ah, no, I think I'm fine with what I have.
I'm pretty sure I don't need anything new.
Hmm, may I have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
Give me...~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
If you'd be so kind...~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please.
Give me a second to think... Ah, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please.
Maybe... ~cards.text~?
~Cards.text~ for me please, dealer.
Oh, I won't be needing anything new for this round, I don't think.
It's okay to not swap out any cards, right?
I believe my hand is fine as it is.
I trust this hand, would it be okay to keep it?
I'm okay, no need for new cards.
Hmmm... would it be too much trouble to ask for a whole new hand?
I don't think any of these will do me good, so...
Ah, dealer, may I swap out all my cards?
I think I might need a whole new hand.
Would it be too much trouble to swap all of them?
Fufu, it may sound surprising when I'm like this, but I don't want to swap any.
Oh, I got lucky this time, I'm fine not swapping any~
I believe my hand is fine as it is. Fufu, really!
Hmmm... perhaps I'll exchange ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Dealer, may I have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
May I have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please? Thank you in advance.
I think ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ seems like the best decision for now.
Hmmm, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ perhaps? Thank you~
Sorry for the trouble, dealer, but may I swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~? Thank you!
Hmm... I think I'll be on trading ~cards.text~ for this round!
Maybe ~cards.text~ will be my new lucky number?
Maybe an entirely new hand? Please~
Things aren't looking so good for me in this one, so, five new ones, please?
Hmm, this place makes me think of my senior class. In fact, this school is quite similar to Yumenosaki... But there's no 3-A without Itsuki glaring daggers at me, ufufu.
Playing at a school does make me feel nostalgic, but I guess not as much as it should... I'm pretty sure I broke an absence record, with how often I was on sick leave~
Oh, here's a fun fact for you-- Did you know I used to be my school's student council president? I know, meeting me in this place really makes it look like I'm not fit for the role...
Ahh, playing this game really makes me feel like I'm actually 19, though... all the work for Starmaker, for fine, for my family's company, mandatory health breaks... I feel like an old man sometimes~

state.text: I wonder if anyone I know has ever played strip poker. Rei does look like the type... and there's this rumor he got more famous by sleeping with higher ups-- Ah, if anyone asks, though, I didn't say a thing.

case.state: Hmmm, is this the universe praising me for taking a break from work~?
You know, I wonder who this office belongs to. If my luck says anything, is that they might be cheering for me...
Hmm, I wonder if this means a streak of bad luck will come soon!
Oh...? I might be in danger, or I might not~
Fluttering about in a dream, the romantic within me is feeling lost upon awakening... ♫
Holding you tight, I'll never let go again, you've caught the youngest princess' heart! ♫
Our secret romance, and even though I want to feel you, all we can do is gaze at each other ♫
Ring out, shall I name this heart-rending pain "snow halation"? ♫
Hmm, I hope there aren't any sore losers in this table...
(Fufu, just as planned.)
Card games are so simple... it feels quite soothing, sometimes.
...something like that, this far into the game?
Dealer doesn't think I'm cute enough, hmmm...
My luck.. really has been all over the place, lately...
I'm not sure if this could be considered lucky...
(But... I wanted to...)
Honestly... I'm a bit nervous to be playing with women. Not that I haven't before, but, you know, I'm a recent all-boys high graduate, so I'm not very experienced~
Ah, maybe I should ask Kaoru-kun to join me one of these days... well, as long as he doesn't steal my spotlight~ I'd still like to talk to the girls here, too.
I guess it could be worse...
So... how is everyone else... doing?
I can't tell anything just by looking at this hand...
(Ugh, how am I even supposed to pay attention like this...)
Oh, this hand is... {small} um, what was it anyway...
The feeling I have now... is a bit like the one I used to get before my lives...
Such an uncertain hand, hmm...
How is everyone feeling, by the way? I do hope no one is too nervous...
I wonder if I remembered to clear my search history...
Hmm, I hope the maid didn't misplace my favorite sweater again...
Maybe I should try to bring a friend for my next game?
I can read through some of your poker faces' so easily, you know~
Let's keep doing our bests, no matter what hands we get, alright?
Well, it's good to learn to work with what you have, even if it's not the best.
Fufu... something like this shouldn't feel exciting, but...
You know, this really reminds me of my Yumenosaki days. Boys do get quite close to each other in gender exclusive schools, you know...

I have to confess, and I hope this stays between all of us, but... I feel more confident playing with other guys, since I have more experience there... but that does mean it's also a bit too warm for comfort, too...
It's not that surprising to think that a male idol is into other men, right? People do make up all sorts of rumors about us... Fufu, they're always just a little off, though.
Oh, huh... well, I'm not well versed in the concept of karma, but I guess having particularly bad luck at a place like this is only fair for me...
You know, I won't lie, I feel a bit strange playing this game at a school. Like I'll be cursed with eternal bad luck or something... I've already gotten away with far too much in my school days.
Ehhh, am I being punished for playing this at a work night? Maybe doubly punished since it's at a workplace...
Fufu, if cards can tell the future... I think mine are telling me I shouldn't have sneaked out to play in a work night...
Dealer, this hand is making me feel sick. May I swap my cards again?
Eeh, dealer, that was a bit cruel, don't you think?
Well, it's not like I've ever been particularly lucky...
Hm, maybe I shouldn't have swapped that...
Eh, I'll see what I can do with this hand...
It could be still be worse, couldn't it?
(Why do I already feel exposed--?)
Weeeeell, I've never been a sore loser, anyway...
You're toying with me, dealer...
(...mm, it might be me, this round...)
(Are they looking at me? ...how are they going to react if I lose?)
Ah, this hand might...
Oh, does this mean...
Ufufu, it's truly a shame you cannot fold in this type of poker, isn't it? Because I feel some of you could use it now, with the hand I have...
Ooh, it seems Lady Luck has taken a liking to me! Beware, everyone~!
Ufufu, someone is about to take off their clothes, and with the hand I have, it's not gonna be me, so just give up~

state.text: Oh... just me and ~finalgirl~ now? Hmmm, no, I don't think I want to go down easily. You'll have to break me if you want to win~
Oh, just me and ~finalgirl~... I'm not sure if I'll be able to make it...

case.state: Well, ~finalgirl~, it seems like it's just the two of us now, isn't it? Ufufu... that's quite the scenario to be in.
It's just me and you now, ~finalgirl~. Hmm, I wonder if I'm going to make it~

state.text: Haa, just me and ~finalgirl~ left... Despite my best efforts, I still have to wait to get what I want... ugh, it's torture~

case.state: O-Oh, both of us are completely out of any clothes to strip... haa, this is the last round of the game, my heart is racing...
Oh, no, not really, I've just been traveling, and I happened to hear the Inventory would hold a game here, so!

Dreams, huh... Maybe you and I are a bit alike in this matter. I hope to revolutionize the entire idol industry someday, to make sure that other idols don't forget what truly matters about being a performer...
Possibly? I imagine all the shuffling from stripping might cause someone to... oh, wait...

Well, Nagisa-chan, I started working after graduation myself because I went to a specialized school, but I've met plenty of people who didn't go somewhere like that, and still managed to find good work. So go for it, I'm sure you'll do well~
Oh, by the way, Miku-san, happy birthday! Ah, but I didn't expect to meet you in person at all, let alone today, so I don't have any gifts in hand...
{small}Do they, now...{!reset} Oh, Moon, it looks like we're the same age. Fufu, I'm looking forward to my 20th, though. I look too old to be 19...
Oh, you promised yourself that? I'll be cheering for Nagisa-chan then, so she can have as much food as she likes... I do it to myself too, but with tea instead!
Hentai...? Ehh, it's not really my thing, in general, but I have found some interesting manga in my friend's belongings... {small}I guess I just prefer audio dramas...
Ah, does me being here bother you, Nagisa-chan? I can look for another table, if you'd prefer. I don't mind it, I don't want you to be uncomfortable.
Oh, Komi-san, you're also taking off your... are you sure? It's okay to take it one item at a time, you know.
Fufu, bold questions coming from Sei... well, I will say I... don't mind it. I'm kind of surprised to hear a girl asking that question, though...
Oh my, Sei is quite generous, isn't she? Well, I'm not legal to drink in Japan, but with the way the Inventory is so different... maybe I could have a tiny sip? I'll let you pick it for me, even~
Fufu, don't worry, Gloria, we'll be patient with you this round... And I doubt anyone minds the view, either~
Oh, do you...? Well, I'm very passionate about my work, I suppose. It's been my dream to become an idol since I found out what they are, more or less...
Ufufu, did I distract you? It wasn't my intention, apologies~ Though... I wouldn't have complained about seeing more of you. But I can be patient.
Fufu, but, you know... assuming I see girls in their underwear often, do I give off that sort of impression? I promise I'm a bit purer than I look.
Ah, uh, a zombie? ...somehow, though, I don't feel so shocked... well, if anything, this means I might be able to come back if I die too, right? And keep on performing...
Ehh? I find bets fun, but... Emi, I think I would actually die if I tried to do that...
Oh, we're here to do the same, then! Isn't it always wonderful to interact with different people, and have some new experiences?
Me as well, Pyrrha. What can I say, it just gets tiring sometimes, doesn't it? The way the people you already know treat you...
Hm, well, I guess my life is very different from most people's... what's an uber, though? I've never heard of it.
Oh, is that a real squirrel? I've never seen one! Ufufu, Eichi is happy to meet you, Paska-san!
Ooh, that's an interesting topic... I'm not sure if I value one more than the other... shouldn't you be aware of the truth so you can make your ideals true to the best of your ability?
A color that reflects me? Hmmm, well, I did choose beige to be my image color. I think it looks good on my outfits, if anything.
Ah, family, hm... it's complicated, I suppose none of us very close to each other. I did have a good relationship with my grandmother, though.
It's not an issue if it doesn't hurt anyone, is it? Especially if they don't find out.
Hmmm... now that's a question that requires some context. You know... what kind of mistakes are we talking about?
Hm... that's actually an interesting question, Revy. Does anyone here seem like they're a killer?
Oh, that's... definitely striking, Miss Nico. Even though I've seen so many different people here, I haven't met anyone with an ability like yours.
Well, I suppose I could say I do? I rarely ever remember the ride to any venue the Inventory is holding a game, for some reason, but I know it doesn't take too long...?
Well, I suppose I could say I do? I rarely ever remember the ride to any venue the Inventory is holding a game, for some reason, but I know it doesn't take too long...?
Well, I suppose I could say I do? I rarely ever remember the ride to any venue the Inventory is holding a game, for some reason, but I know it doesn't take too long...?
Well, I suppose I could say I do? I rarely ever remember the ride to any venue the Inventory is holding a game, for some reason, but I know it doesn't take too long...?
Ufufu... Yuno-kun is a really shy about enjoying this, isn't he? It's okay, you know, I won't tell anyone...~
I'd like to say I am that person, but... I know someone who's even more like that, kind of unsettlingly, though... ah, and his last name is Aoba, that's funny...
Oh, hobbies? Fufu, maybe mine is boring, but I like collecting teacups~ and a bit of idol merchandise as well... just a little, fufu.
Major surgeries? I've definitely had much more of them than I'd like... I'm only lucky the scars have faded with time.
As many times as I can- ah, I'm not supposed to say things like that, but... I don't care much anymore.
Aah, I mean, I'd be a hypocrite if I said I wouldn't do it to someone else, so...{small}fufu, I'm not supposed to say those things in public, but, whatever.
...oh, do girls like that too? I hadn't thought about it much, but, you've given me ideas... {small}fufu, even if that's not very idol-like of me.
Oh, grocery shopping? Of course, I've never had the chance to do that before!
Eeh, is that so? I wonder where that rumor came from... you'll have to tell me more details so I can say if I believe it or not.
Oh, but, Ignatz, I raise you the question... what is wrong with liking to be bullied? I'd definitely not judge you for that...
Well, my scars are all faded now, but I had a good few from surgeries all over my chest. I had quite a few when I was very young, so...
Hmm, I don't know, it depends on who I would be hypothetically dating. I wouldn't share a partner with just anyone, you know?
Oh, have you figured me out? Fufufu, I'm almost embarrassed... come on, Mari, surely we could stand on stage together, couldn't we?
Eh? I... didn't expect Mari to have these sort of tastes, that's quite... surprising... ♡
Ah, you understand, Mari...? It's wonderful, isn't it... ufufu, even hearing you describe it, my heart starts racing ♡
Spirits...? I don't know anything about that, but my birthday is January 10th, so that makes me... a Capricorn, I think.
This Gregor of yours seems quite sweet. He reminds me of someone in my friend's idol unit... fufu, it's cute when strong men are so gentle...
Oh, I'm wearing my old school uniform, but I suppose it's still one of my favorites, in a nostalgic kind of way? My casuals aren't too different, though. I love sweater vests too much.
Oh, how is that even a question? What's the point if you can't see them-- and they can't see you?
Hmmm~ Idols aren't supposed to date in the first place, but if I happened to be in a relationship, I don't think I'd do it... {small}if we didn't agree on that beforehand, that is.
Mm... are you supposed to stop doing it, if you're dating someone? {small}Well, if that's the case, it'd be a loophole if I just did it and let them watch me, right?
Ufufu, well... I'm a bit picky, and I don't always have the time, so not very often, honestly...
Eh, duck carrying? Well, one should be around... 3 kilograms, or 7-ish pounds...? I think I could carry maybe two, in a good day.
Oh, you don't have money for the train? I can cover it for you no problem, just tell me how much you need.
We'll get to see Dr. Ziegler loosen up a bit? I feel honored~
Ooh? I'll call you Sakura-san from now on, then!
Ufufu, yes, I know! That's one of the reasons it's so impressive to see you here, Miku-san. I never thought I'd be able to speak to you in person.
Fufu, really, Miku-san? I think I understand you in this regard. I've seen quite a few about myself... fans surely are creative, aren't they?
Fufu, I'm sorry, was that too strange? I tend to be a bit morbid sometimes. But it's true, even knowing so many different idols, Franchouchou's music just has a way of making you feel energized~
(Y-Yeah... fuck, I've thought about him alright...)
{small}Y-You were thinking about...{!reset} ah, it's okay, I'm just teasing you... but, you know, it's not a bad thing to be honest...~
Well... I'd like to think I can do a fine job with what I know. I'm sure you're aware idols aren't supposed to date, but... ah, I shouldn't spill too many secrets... when other people are around.
Fufu... if you did, well... being careful and taking it slow should be a good way to start... I'd never do anything I knew would hurt Natsuki-chan... if she wanted to do that with me.
Oh, well... I'm not the best at distinguishing my own feelings, Aishi-chan, but I have a feeling I... might understand that, surprising as it may sound.
Something we like about ourselves? That's a sweet question. Hmm, I have to admit I think I look a little too weak, but I suppose I have pretty legs?
You know, I've wondered about that too. People have named names a few times, but never the same ones, and never any I recognize. I guess it's a group. But I don't know how... the rest works.
(Ahhh, she's looking like a doctor again... the universe is so mean to Eichi-kun, never letting him escape the doctors...)
Hey, Darkness, you keep saying these things, but... you're actually enjoying this, aren't you? You know, it's okay to admit it. There's nothing wrong with being a filthy pervert sometimes.
Well, in yen, that's about the allowance I used to get... so, I guess... not much? Maybe I'd buy a new tea set.
Oh, hm... I may be able to think of someone, but I don't think I should talk about... that person.
I wouldn't want to damage that person's reputation by giving off information in a place like this, but... well, yes, I agree with you.
Ah, hm... I think it depends on what kind of porn you've been looking at, Nanoko-chan. If you try too hard to use it as reference, it might end up poorly... just trust me on this.
Oh, sorry, Nanoko-chan, but it doesn't really replace experience... the opportunities to have said experience, though, may be way closer to you than you'd imagine.
Fufu... I wouldn't say it replaces experience, but it's good to have an idea of what you like, you know... certain people enjoy taking requests very much.

condition.said: A trip to a shopping mall, huh? Hmm... No thanks!

case.state: Awww, no mall trip with Mari-san? That's a shame~ but that's okay, I don't mind leaving that for another day.
Oh, Nanoko-chan likes anime, right? Hmm, you really do remind me of my underclassmen from when I was still in school...
Ohh, you'll come with me, Mari-san? That's wonderful! I still get lost easily so you might have to guide me, but I'm sure we'll have fun.
Hmmm, catchy songs, especially ones that might get you "in the mood"...? I don't personally have any, but... you might've just given me an idea for a new solo...
Is that so? Well, knowing myself, I might just need it, so I'll rely on you if I suddenly feel like I'll collapse!
Oh, how reliable of you, Mikan-san! It's good to know someone in the table has medical knowledge, means I'll be sure to live to play again~
Hm, what's my least depressing... Oh! There was this one time I was about to get an autograph from an idol I'm a fan of, and I went into cardiac arrest, and...
Bad luck? Oh, well, the classmates who hate me the most literally own deadly weapons, but if anything, I think that's a bit lucky, maybe I'll die interestingly.
Fufu, alright, then, order as many as you want! Ah, maybe I should get myself one, too? I've never had it.
Eh, you won't help me carry my stuff if I need it? How mean of you, Takatoshi-kun. I didn't think you were the type to pick on sick people.
Oh, is that so? I'm glad I'm not alone! Sometimes I want to keep buying things, just to see them falling off the display...
Oh, a robot? Did you need to get a license to pilot it? I don't really care for cars, so maybe I'll get that instead?
Ehhh, is it really that strange of a topic? You must not be a regular here then, Yuno-kun. If you had seen what I've seen, you'd understand.
Ufufu that may be true... but, well, while I may not be able to buy alcohol, I'd still love to treat you to something, Mari, so let me know if there's anything you want~
Is that so? I've never felt something like this... I suppose being hospitalized always makes me wonder if that's when I'll die, but I think that's different...
(Oh, is he not good at reading? Hm, maybe I could help him later... I wouldn't want to embarrass him by pointing it out, though, he's far too cute for that.)
That's true! Ufufu, I'm sure my answer to that won't be so interesting, though... I'm just from Japan, not too far away from Tokyo, and I live in the Ensquare dorms. That's about it .
Hmmm, Kazuma-kun is quite confident today, isn't he? Well, I'll take you up on your offer, then. But I'll have you know I won't be easy to defeat~
Eeh, Kazuma-kun wants to make a bet? That sounds interesting, I'm in! I'll be doing my best, though, just so you know~
Ah, really, Blake? You might have to act as my tour guide, since I'm still not used to malls... but I'm sure we could have fun together~!

Eh, really? Well, I suppose I'm too used to the comfort my own lifestyle allows me... fufu, it'd probably still be difficult for me to move around so much if I had to, though, with the way this body is...

Fufu, believe it or not, I feel the same, Blake... it was plenty of work to get where I am in my career, and while I've definitely made a lot of mistakes... I would like to keep performing, you know? For as long as I can,
Oh, Blake, you said you're a huntress? I wonder what it's like to have that sort of occupation... it sounds quite dangerous, and yet you seem so calm talking about it...
Oh, you have a compression glove? I understand the feeling a bit, though in my case, it's compression socks, sometimes... my ankle joints already aren't great, and since I dance a lot....

Ah, n-no, I don't think I have any... it's not weird if I want to... b-be humiliated in front of others or-- have them call me disgusting and-- {small}um, or having them... c-choke me, or threaten me, or...
(Anatolyyyy, why are you so cute?)
Hmmm, Darkness has taken a liking to Nagatoro-chan, hasn't she? Somehow, that's not surprising at all~
Ufufu, I'm happy to hear Blake is enjoying the view... ♡ Look as much as you want, okay? That's what I'm here for... unless you want more later, that is~
You know, I was wondering the same, Nagisa-chan. Maybe we'll bring out futons or mattresses later? I've only ever had sleepovers at my own home with one person, so I wouldn't know...
Oh, a school trip? I hope you've been having fun! I'm not from here either, but I'm just traveling alone. I'm happy to have gotten a few days off~
Well, that's actually a good way to describe it.. I know it may not be groundbreaking... but what matters to me is that I create something that can make people smile.
Oh... Mari-san is really bold, isn't she? It's always wonderful to meet girls like you~ {small}and I'm happy to be understood...ufufu...
Fufu, we think alike, don't we, Mari-san? Sometimes you just can't help but do it if it's so exciting...
You're not trying to lose? Wow, I could've sworn you were throwing, with that face you were making... you really think people aren't noticing your panting, Darkness? Everyone can hear it.

Ufufu, you're looking forward to it, aren't you? You know, you should step into the middle of the circle when it happens, so everybody can get a good look. With the way you are, I know it's just a matter of time until you lose.
Awww, come on, Darkness, that's such a rude thing to say about someone when you came here to put yourself on display... fufu, are you looking to get punished or something like that?
Mm, how close could they be, I also wonder... If you happen to figure it out by the end of the game, would you... tell me about it, if you want?
See, that's a good start. Like that, all you'd have to do is answer, if someone just happened to look at you and ask, "So, Nanoko-chan, what do you want me to do?"
Fufu, I'm sorry about that, Nanoko-chan... but you know, it's not so scary when you actually get to do it. As long as you and your partner are honest with each other, I believe you should be good.
Mm, how close could they be, I also wonder... If you happen to figure it out by the end of the game, would you... tell me about it, if you want?
See, that's a good start. Like that, all you'd have to do is answer, if someone just happened to look at you and ask, "So, Nanoko-chan, what do you want me to do?"
Eh, another universe? That should only be possible if you die, yes? I'm not well versed in afterlife myths myself, though. I don't have any particular beliefs either.
Siblings, huh... I suppose I'd like to have one, but, well, I wouldn't really want them to have those kinds of genetics. I suppose in a different world, though...
Well, Hilbert, I've had my own share of hardships, though I guess they're different from yours... Life just makes you realize these kinds of things, doesn't it?

Hmmm, I'm not sure if you're into idol music, Sakura-san, but if you are, I have quite a few recommendations! Oh, I could even show them to you in my phone, I have Spotify Premium so it wouldn't be an issue, and I downloaded all the albums so even if we don't have signal here it shouldn't be a problem, even if there are some wonderful albums that aren't up for streaming yet, but I do know how to find these too so just say the word if you want to hear them! If you tell me what genre you prefer I could also guess which unit would be more to your liking, and then we should--

...Oh! No, I'm okay, Dr. Ardebit. It's just that you... kind of look like a medical doctor, with your coat. I get the feeling you're going to scold me for playing a game that's "bad for my health" or something...
Hmm? I don't think I know what a Gallade is, but... Hilbert, don't you think they may mean that as a compliment? It's not like curves are a bad look on anyone...

You do have wider hips, but I honestly think they give you a quite handsome figure~ Curvier guys are... how do people where you're from say it... like a "shiny Pokemon", or something? {small}I don't know the language well...

Well, I'm usually driven around by one of my family's personal drivers. It's not my preferred method, though, just the most common. I like driving by myself better, but sometimes it really tires me out~
Loyalty, hm... I have to admit I find it a very desirable trait. I guess in a romantic context it sounds even more appealing, but loyal friends are also something to be sought after, right?
I would like advice on getting less sleep... I'm not even that much of a heavy sleeper, but if I'm tired enough, I can and will end up falling asleep just about anywhere...
Ehhh, a child? I feel too young to think about that... I wouldn't want to pass on my genes to them, that much I know. But maybe I'd adopt, if I retired...
Fufu, from the male perspective, I don't think you really need to try, Jura... you seem like the dream girl of quite a few guys I know.
Shh, Nagatoro-chan, don't mention it too much or one my butlers might show up to get me out of here! But I'll be fine~ what's life without a little risk anyway?
(Fufu, maybe I am being a bit meaner than usual, but there are some types of people I just can't resist to tease...)
Smokers? I think people should be allowed to do whatever they wish, so I don't mind. Well... my lungs do, though, so I'd just ask they don't smoke around me...
Ah, my lungs can get quite annoying if I inhale smoke, so I'd prefer no one do it around me... I find the act sort of... visually appealing, though?
I have to admit... though I'm quite good at poker, playing at the Inventory always has its way of making me lose my focus.
Hmmm, this is a bit troublesome. I want to be able to tease everyone for losing too, but... fufu, you're not making it easy for me to focus either~
(Well, I can't tell if they know me, but either way, if rumors spread about me, it shouldn't be difficult to fix the situation.)

(Eh, if ~celebrity~ is here as well, isn't ~celebrity.ifMale(he|she)~... but if ~celebrity.ifMale(he|she)~ spreads rumors about me, wouldn't that be outing ~celebrity.ifMale(himself|herself)~ as a player too?)
You know, I'm really not mad you ended up taking my tie. You look adorable with it, like I've left a mark of myself on you~
~serious~... I'm sorry, but I can't help but wonder, are you sure you're at the right place? You know what game we're playing here, right?

Ah, I realize my ranting might seem a little hard to understand by anyone who doesn't know me... Fufu, don't worry, it's nothing shady, fine is just my idol unit, and Starmaker is the production company~

Oh, have I ever told you guys about Keito? I was trying not to name names of people I know, but I guess that slipped... he's my childhood friend, we met at his family's temple during my grandfather's funeral.
Eh, I guess I might seem kind of morbid talking about death so casually, huh? Fufu, I promise I'm alright. I picked up a habit of joking about it from my family, since we're all sick...

state.text: Ah, um, I forgot I must ask...! Are there any pictures or videos of me being taken?
Ufufu, I'm rather undressed, but that shouldn't distract you too much, right, ~serious~? Since you're so serious and proper~
Oooh? Did I just catch ~serious~ staring at me? Oh, my, I wouldn't have expected you to be so bold...
Is... ~serious~ really pent up, after all? Hmmm, is that what hides behind such a severe face?

case.state: (Ah, I get to meet another idol... and I'm looking so indecent in front of her, but somehow it's so... exciting...)

state.text: Um... ~idol~, please keep my secret safe, will you? If you want compensation for it, well...

case.state: I'm definitely not idol-like now, but, ah...
Ah, ~idol~, it's... so bold of you, you know. Showing yourself... like that...
~idol~, you're really being so, so... a-ah, but don't worry, your secret will be safe with me.
Oh, ~idol~, t-thank you... for the wonderful performance. I can only hope I'll... match up to you, one day.
Psst..., Number One, may I ask for an autograph when we are out of here? Fufu, being an idol fan is what made me want to become one, so...
Aah, Franchouchou is truly amazing... the first time I heard their music, I felt like it could bring me back to life if I died right there!
(Hmm, I wonder if news of fine have spread to Saga... I want to ask Number One if she's heard about me, but I'd hate to seem conceited...)
Oh, Num... I mean, Sakura-san, would you perhaps like to meet up someday, after this? You know, since we're in the same industry, I'd love to hear your perspectives on...
Psst..., Miku-san, may I ask for an autograph when we are out of here? Fufu, being an idol fan is what made me want to become one, so...
I can't believe I'm actually playing a game with Hatsune Miku... ah, even if it's somewhat of a strange one, it feels like my wildest dreams just came true!
(Ahhh, I wonder if Miku-san has ever heard of me... I know she's not exactly like a human idol but, even then... I don't want to seem conceited so I won't ask, though.)

Set a trap now in your ordinary love, leaving no footprints around the cracks in your defenses ♫ ...ufufu, you know, Cantarella was one of my first songs, I've even covered it with one of my colleagues!
I want to run away like Juliet, but please don't call me by that name ♫ ...fufu, Romeo and Cinderella is always stuck in my head, it was my favorite song to cover~

state.text: Hm... maybe I shouldn't be asking a question like this, but... don't any of you think embarrassment feels... kind of good, sometimes?
I feel like this is an embarrassing question, but... well, we're all playing strip poker here, at least one of you must feel like... the exposure is sort of a pleasurable thrill, right?
...you know, I'm often scolded for doing things like that, but it's just natural to feel excited when you're doing something risky, isn't it?

case.state: *cough* {small}Ah, don't worry about me, this just happens.
~serious~... you're giving us quite an eyeful, how does that make you feel?
~serious~, if I stare too much, are you going to scold me? I can't help but wonder...
Doing okay over there, ~serious~? Fufu, I just wonder how that exposure feels to you...
Ah, this game always makes my heart race... no matter what, you can't deny it's thrilling, huh? Well, some games are more than others...
Well, since we're at this point of the game, I hope you don't mind me asking a question... Do any of you come here often? To the Inventory, I mean. I promise I won't judge if you say yes~
Hmmm, you've lost quite a few hands, haven't you, ~mean~? You need to be more careful, you might be getting distracted.
Is everything okay, ~mean~? Are you feeling a little embarrassed, perhaps?
Fufufu, did I just see you angrily looking at me, ~mean~? You know words won't hurt me, so just say whatever's on your mind~
Ah, so many of us are getting so... exposed. I hope that being seen isn't making anybody too uncomfortable...
Fufu... With so many of us being so underdressed, the game should be coming to an end soon, huh... I wonder who will be our victor.
How does it feel for the rest of you, to be seen exposed like this? I know it's quite embarrassing for some people, but, well...
Eh, ~serious~ seems so proper, it's honestly hard to believe you'd be playing a game like this.
Hey, ~serious~, you know what the rules of this game are, yes? Are you really willing to strip, and even...forfeit, in front of all these people?
I can't help but think, ~serious~, for you to come to a place like this, it must be some sort of drastic measure. I wonder if you're pent up...
You know... We are still in a public space, someone could catch sight of us like this... Ah, I'm not sure how to feel about it myself... yet.
Fufu, does the thought that someone might see us doing this... make any of you feel something? Even embarrassment...
The Inventory really isn't like anything else in this world... To enable us to do something like this, where anyone could se...
...Make sure to keep the camera away from me, of course!
Hmmm? Did I just see you pointing that camera at me, ~camera~?
Don't forget I've got my eyes on you, ~camera~.
Oh, after we're done with the game, would anyone perhaps like to accompany me to a trip to a shopping mall? I've somewhat recently been to one for the first time, it's really fun!
I'm curious, do any of you happen to use vending machines often? I didn't even know how they worked until my third year at school. Is that really so strange?
You know, sometimes I do wonder how people who don't own cars or have drivers manage to go places so quickly. Public transport seems so inefficient to me...
This game really is quite strange, you see some things here you'd think were only possible in fiction... fufu, I wonder if maybe I've just died and this is what the afterlife is like.
Don't you all agree the Inventory is really strange? I've seen things that made me wonder if I've actually died and this is just the afterlife... Does anyone feel the same?
Eh, ~mean~ is so mean... we're just here to have fun, aren't we? Hm, maybe you're just embarrassed?
You know, ~mean~, you can keep hurling your insults here and there, but I'm not quite so intimidated for you. I may have a fragile body, but it takes plenty to break my mind...~
You know, ~mean~, I can't help but wonder what you'll do if you lose... would that bravado of yours be gone, or would it stay? I'm excited to find out, I must admit.
Being in and out of hospitals all the time really is so boring, it's great to be able to just relax and play a game like this! Ah, I do hope none of you relate to this statement, though.
You know, I'm actually not supposed to be here at all, I just got out of a rather bad health week, but after being so... inactive, I kind of just needed to do something different, you know.
You know, sometimes things get so strange at the Inventory, I'll just start expecting to wake up at the hospital soon, with more morphine than blood in my system...
My, my... this has to be Keito's spirit haunting me for sneaking off to do something like this, and at an office, no less...
You know, I wonder who this office belongs to. If my luck says anything, is that whoever it is isn't very happy with me now...
(This hand... what does it even mean? All I can feel is myself burning up from all the staring...)
(I-I... hope I lose this round, I feel so...)
Mmh... Let me lose already...
(Fufu, like I wanted to come here and do anything but spread my legs and touch myself in front of a bunch of people...)
I must be honest, this... venue, isn't really somewhere I'm very comfortable in. It's making it a bit difficult to focus.
Ah, I'm definitely still not used to playing at a venue like this... But I'm open for new experiences, of course.
I can't help but wonder... is this the back of one of the establishments owned by the Inventory, or just... a random place? The former option is a bit...
The heat really is unforgiving here, isn't it... hm, is it against the rules for the players to have a drink of water, or...?
It's really hot, isn't it... is the universe perhaps trying to encourage me to lose?
The hot air definitely doesn't make it any easier to focus, honestly...
Fufu, don't you all feel a bit like the world is tempting you into losing rounds, now? It's just rather hot...
In a way, I'm glad I've lost a few rounds and got rid of the extra layers... but on the other side, fufu...
Honestly, being here for a while has made me a bit sweaty... Fufu, I sure hope it's not making my shirt see-through, or anything like that...
Sometimes, I wonder how the Inventory manages to hold games at so many different venues... of course, I'm not complaining about it, just curious.
I wonder why you all decided to join this table. You know, the possibility of being exposed in public is real... most people are quite embarrassed by that.
Ah, I'm quite enjoying... the breeze here.
Oh, now that I think about it, I wonder if there's anyone looking at us from a distance...
Do they serve tea here, by any chance? They might not have my favorite blends, but I’m open to new experiences. It’s why I came here in the first place.
Is anyone hungry? Feel free to order whatever menu items you'd like, I'll gladly cover the tab if anyone wishes, too!
I’ve played plenty of poker before, so if anyone is having trouble, don’t be afraid to rely on me for tips~
This is the most thrilling version of poker, don’t you agree? Ah, if only I could have brought Keito along with me... I think he could use some loosening up.
Let’s keep doing our best, everyone. Even if you're quite underdressed there’s always a chance you could still win… if you want to.
(I wonder if Wataru would ever be willing to join a game like this… he’s so unpredictable, I feel like he’d say yes but disappear in a flock of doves the first time he lost…)
Maybe I shouldn't come back here so often, but it's just too much fun every time...
Fufu… this game is making my heart race, if I’m being honest… if anything bad happens to me, you all will have to take responsibility.
Hey, ~human~, if you're so fond of looking at me, you should just go look up "Eichi Tenshouin merchandise"~
...such a dangerous game...
Ah, my breathing is quite fast, maybe I should... sit down...
Ehhh, I wish I could order a drink here... but my 20th is still a good few months away~ Well, actually, that's the drinking age in Japan, and the Inventory is weird, so, maybe...
Ehhh, I wish I could order a drink here... Aah, my 20th is close, but it still feels such a long wait~ Well, actually, that's the drinking age in Japan, and the Inventory is weird, so, maybe...
Aw, you guys still stood your ground even though I told you to fold? I guess you're more determined than I think...
Fufu, you really couldn't believe me even though I mentioned Miss Lady Luck herself? Well, I guess I was a little too over the top...
Aw, come on, I spoke so confidently~ I really thought you were going to believe me...

state.text: Eh-- what? I'm the first one to strip? Now that's unexpected... well, I suppose I don't mind doing the honors...
Ehhh, do I look like I'd ever do something like that~? How mean of you, Mari...

case.state: Oh, Mari, I'll do my very best... I'd hate to disappoint you, after all~
Ufufu, I think you know I just couldn't possibly leave you alone here... I'll happily stand on stage alongside you, Mari ♡

Ah, well... when I was in school, I learned to memorize dancing routines by watching them, so I don't practice as much as my unitmates, admittedly... so when I am on stage, I'm usually well enough to do it.
Fufu... I know, hearing someone in my position sounds a bit like... fanservice, doesn't it? But, you know, Natsuki-chan... I do come here specifically to have a break from work....
Aw, just what are you thinking about me, Natsuki-chan? I wouldn't rush into that part of the game like this...
Into it... that's really a bold claim to make... I wonder what makes you think that, Mari-san.
Aw, you flatter me, Yuno-kun. Consider me being there your pass already, I'm just happy to meet new people, you know.
Oh, they haven't? Hm, I suppose it's not surprising, if you don't live in Japan.... I don't mind if you call me Eichi-kun either, that's how most of my friends call... called me, anyway.
Fufu, is that so, Blake...? I wonder what about me gives off that impression. But I'm happy to hear you feel more comfortable around me, I hope we can get along~
Ah, is that so, Takatoshi-kun...? Well... perhaps I could help, then? It wouldn't be an issue at all.
Eh, really? I'll have plenty to teach you about male idols then, Takatoshi-kun. It's a much more complex job than you'd think.
Oh~? How so, Natsuki-chan?
(Hmmm, is she staring? I wonder if she's a fan...)
Fufu, sorry, Natsuki-chan, I have a habit of wearing a lot of clothing... be just a little more patient for me, okay?
Oh, I don't mean to tease Natsuki-chan, fufu... I just usually dress like this. I'll be sure to make it up for you next time, okay?
Ah, my parents...? No way. You see, I've just been hospitalized a lot, and idol media was my main comfort, so I wanted to do something like that too, you know... being able to make others smile.
Fufu... me? Well, if I am here, I'm not repulsed by that, nor am I too shy... but saying I'm... "into it," that's a bold claim.
Hmmm, you think I'm pretty? I'm flattered. Fufu, I wonder what makes you assume something like that about me, though~
Hmm, you've recognized me? I supposed there's no way to deny that... I am an idol, yes, why do you ask?
Fufu, you got close, my 20th is still in a few months... I'm a recent grauate too, so we're really not that far apart, Natsuki-chan. I must only be about an year and a half older than you.

condition.saying: So, Eichi-san, could you tell me more about your idol troupe?

case.state: Ah, you're interested in it? I'm honored! We are called fine, as in the italian word for ending... I feel it's fitting since we borrow some elements from classical music~! Oh, if you'd like to see us live, I'd be happy to give you a ticket!
Ah, well, I have a couple health issues, most of my family does, but... it's nothing that makes strip poker unsafe, fufu. Well, unless someone particularly cute strips... just kidding~
Oh, you could say I am, yes. Fufu, are you curious about how I sound like? I wouldn't want to disrupt the game, but maybe I could give you a bit of a private performance later~
Fufu, yes, I'm grateful for all the attention my fans give me, but... I can't deny it's good to have a break. So you're known in your place of origin as well, Mr. Dunban?
Well, even people from Earth are surprised about the concept of male idols sometimes, so I can't blame you. I assume there isn't much men in Mejarian media in general?
Ah, my condition is almost entirely genetic. I'm not contagious either. Most people on Earth are far sturdier than this... You might've just gotten unlucky enough to meet the weakest ones first.
Fufu, it's that visible, isn't it? Nagatoro-chan is an athlete, though, the competition wouldn't be fair~ I might dance, but I can't do much of anything else...

state.text: Hmmm, me? I do find the game fun, but that's such a bold claim, you know, Nagatoro-chan. I wonder where you're getting that idea from~

case.state: Eh? That's... somehow quite flattering to hear. There are plenty of guys like me, actually. Maybe I could introduce you to them? It depends on what your type for personality is.
Oh, you're sweet, but there's no need to worry, I've always dealt with sickness, and at the moment I'm feeling quite alright. Maybe even better, after you asked me.
Eh? Plants can-- Ah, um, I don't think that's a good option for me, though. My condition is kind of... and money isn't an issue... But you're really a kind person, huh? Offering help like that~
I... um, I promise I'm not... losing on purpose at all...
Huh, what is... I lost again? There's... no way...
A-Am I just... completely unable to pay attention to anything, now?
Oh my, have I been found out? And here I thought I was being sneaky~ I do lead my own idol group, yes, I'm honored that you even thought I might be familiar.
Oh, so that time has come for me, hm... now I'm kind of nervous, knowing I'll have to do it with Natsuki-chan here...
Ah, yet another loss...? My, that's... unlikely, I'm not sure what's going on...
Oh, hm... this really is a streak of bad luck, huh? I hope I can bounce back...
E-Eh? I'm just... continuing to lose... somehow. That's unexpected...
Hmmm, I guess I have no choice but to strip... Fufu, it would be rude to not honor our fellow players' efforts, wouldn't it?
Haa, you know what, I'll admit it, I'm so happy it's my turn~ it was just getting so uncomfortable to wear this...
My turn, huh? I guess I should have expected that, with a hand like this~
Ah, um, my last layer has to... well, it's okay. It's been feeling... much tighter, anyway.
I... guess there's no way to escape from that. You've been defeating me fairly, s-so...
Oh, my first defeat? Well, that's a shame... but rules are rules, aren't they?
Aw, it's my turn again? And just when I was thinking I was getting the hang of the game...
O-Oh, I lost. Well... at this point, I don't really have many options, do I? I wonder if anyone is enjoying this...
Oh no, I lost~ Whatever shall I do...
Hmmm, I suppose it's fair I must strip now. I've been avoiding it for quite a few rounds, huh?

state.text: Well, I lost. Are there are specific requests the audience would like to make? Aah, that made me sound like a stripper, but I suppose I am one now...

case.state: Hmmm, seeing my socks and more of my neck wasn't enough? You want me to show even more? Geez, you guys are kind of perverts, aren't you...
My, my... I've lost again, and now there's no more stalling with my smaller pieces, huh... I wonder where this will go.
Aw, I'll have to strip again? How embarrassing~
Oh, ~player~, are you excited to watch me strip? Then, by all means, watch my every move...
Oh, it's my turn, hm... you might be surprised to hear that, but I'm actually conflicted about what I should take off now.
Oh, my winning streak is over? Aw, well, I guess rules are rules...
Oh, it's my turn, hmm... I guess it's fair. Fufu, I hope it's not too frustrating that I'm ahead of everyone~
Well, my turn had to come at one point, didn't it?
Aw, there goes another piece of mine... But we're just starting out, so I'm not too worried~
Hmmm, my turn? Well, I wonder what I should go for now...
Fufu... And I'm down to one small piece left, hm?
Oh... I suppose I wouldn't be able to run from that, anyway...
Fufu, and it's my turn again... I'm wondering just how my... audience interest is looking like.
Oh. Here comes the end of the road...~
Fufu, even if I keep losing, I don't mind. The most important thing is to have fun, isn't it?
Hmmm, I'm not doing too well at the game, am I... But it's okay, the most important thing is to have fun, anyway~
Wait, am I, ah... the most undressed person here? {small}And I'm about to become even more undressed...
Wait, am I, ah... the most undressed person here? {small}And I'm about to become even more undressed...
...but, well, I had already decided I was going to take off my sweater now, so that was just a joke! Maybe think about what you'd like to see next round, if you can defeat me then.
